publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1002# Murdo Fraser: Wild Scottish Venison-That the Parliament acknowledges the world-class quality of wild Scottish venison as a healthy, nutritious, low-fat product; notes with concern the financial difficulties facing the sector in light of critically low prices, and considers that the Scottish Executive should undertake a study into how the promotion and marketing of Scottish venison may be improved and the industry supported.

S2M-1002# Murdo Fraser: Wild Scottish Venison-That the Parliament acknowledges the world-class quality of wild Scottish venison as a healthy, nutritious, low-fat product; notes with concern the financial difficulties facing the sector in light of critically low prices, and considers that the Scottish Executive should undertake a study into how the promotion and marketing of Scottish venison may be improved and the industry supported.

S2M-1002# Wild Scottish Venison (lodged on 4 March 2004) Mark Ballard*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mike Rumbles*, Bruce Crawford*, Murray Tosh*, Mike Pringle*
S2M-1002# Wild Scottish Venison (lodged on 4 March 2004) Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mary Scanlon*, Alex Neil*, Pauline McNeill*, Tricia Marwick*, Eleanor Scott*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-1002# Wild Scottish Venison (lodged on 4 March 2004) Bill Aitken*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-1002# Wild Scottish Venison (lodged on 4 March 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1002# Wild Scottish Venison (lodged on 4 March 2004) Shiona Baird*
S2M-1002# Wild Scottish Venison (lodged on 4 March 2004) Linda Fabiani*
